lead_paragraph: About four months before the 2011 draft, over a hundred scouts descended upon the baseball complex at a private academy west of Orlando. They were there to eye a couple of teenagers born in Puerto Rico who would become the draft's most coveted shortstops.

headline.print_headline: Baez, Lindor Enter Series With Puerto Rican Bond
headline.main: Baez, Lindor Enter Series With Puerto Rican Bond
